show_name: Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu Appare! Sengoku Daikassen (movie 10)
other_title: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ アッパレ! 戦国大合戦 (Japanese)
蠟筆小新-風起雲湧！壯烈！戰國大會戰 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: After mysteriously being sent back in time, Shin-chan saves the life of Matabe Ijiri, a samurai who leads the army of a small province in Japan. Welcomed as a guest by Ijiri, Shinnosuke must figure out why he is stuck in 1574.
